targets.query:
from(bucket: "SS-Anthem")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "region_obj_count_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "Anthem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "SBLANE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SS-Anthem")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "region_obj_dwell_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dwell_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "Anthem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "SBLANE")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SS-Anthem")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "region_obj_count_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "Anthem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "pedestrian")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "NOPED")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "Anthem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "pedestrian")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "ECWLK")

from(bucket: "SS-Anthem")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pedestrian_loc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pedid" or r["_field"] == "longitude" or r["_field"] == "latitude")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "Anthem")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()  
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")

from(bucket: "SS-Anthem")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "region_obj_count_2")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "vehicle")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
